Title: Erratum: Recent advances in low oxidation state aluminium chemistry (Chem. Sci. (2020) DOI: 10.1039/d0sc02686g)
Abstract: © The Royal Society of Chemistry.The authors regret that incorrect details were given for ref. 69 in the original article. The correct version of ref. 69 is given below as ref. 1. The Royal Society of Chemistry apologises for these errors and any consequent inconvenience to authors and readers.
